Name: Visual Inspection
Check that all components are present on board and that there is no visible damage

Name: X_PWR
Check the the X_PWR voltage is correct.
Measure using the tester, and should find approximately 1.2V.

Name: lpGBT setup
Perform nominal setup from BE. Do setup, link trick, setup. Check PUSMStatus (0x1d9) reports READY (0x13) for all 3 lpGBTs. Check lpGBTs locked to BE All 3 RX equal within 200 Hz. Check All 3 RX-DV equal within 200 Hz

Name: EClock Rates
Check that all EClocks are running at 320MHz.

Name: lpGBT IC/EC communication
Check operability of lpGBT IC/EC communication
Read and write to lpBGT registers via ICEC. Check DAQ lpGBT read of registers via IC. Check Trigger lpGBTs: successful read registers via EC. Ensure write and readback to user ID registers (0x004 - 0x007)

Name: I2C
Check that engine can communicate as an I2C master

Name: GPIO functionality
Check the quality of the GPIOs
Read and write to all GPIO channels and verify levels. Write nominal configuration and then toggle each line one-by-one and verify change in both lpGBT status and voltage level

Name: ADC functionality
Measure known voltages/resistances. Check measured values for all 4 gains within tolerances, (only need to do all 4 gains for one measurement).

Name: Uplink quality
Check the quality of the uplinks
PRBS validation from lpGBTs. Check bit error rate below threshold.

Name: Downlink quality
Check the quality of the downlinks
Eye opening test. Check eye opening width and height below threshold.

Name: Fast Command quality
Check the quality of the Fast Command path
PRBS validation from and back to ZCU. Check bit error rate below threshold.

Name: Elink quality
Check the quality of the elinks
PRBS validation from and back to ZCU. Check bit error rate below threshold.

Name: Crossover link quality
Check the quality of the crossover links
PRBS validation from and back to ZCU. Check bit error rate below threshold.
